newsitem.title: JAPAN: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - June 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - June 23.

text.p: Following are some of the leading stories in the Japanese press on Monday, as reported by Kyodo news agency.
-- G7 summit in Denver calls for Japan's domestic demand-led growth and urges curbs on Japan's surpluses.
-- G7 summit communique to urge structural reform.
-- Voters in Mitake, Gifu prefecture, overwhelmingly reject waste disposal plant.
-- G7 summit communique re-affirms fight against terrorism.
